alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Laurens; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 8:03PM EST until January 17 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River at Dublin affecting Washington, Wilkinson, Johnson and Laurens Counties. For the Oconee River Basin...including Dublin...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Oconee River at Dublin. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Between 23.5 and 24 feet, Minor flooding spreads further into the woodland areas. The water level begins to flood Rex Miller Road...downstream left bank of the Highway 80 bridge. Also Old River Lane...upstream and left bank from the bridge begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Sunday the stage was 23.7 feet and steady. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM EST Sunday was 23.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Tuesday evening and continue falling to 11.7 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 21 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.7 feet on 02/10/1985. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. Monday morning at 1015 AM EST.
